articles.description: Samsung will reportedly launch Exynos 8xx, Exynos 12xx, and Exynos 22xx series SoCs in 2021, with the latter said to debut as Exynos 2200.

articles.title: The Xiaomi Redmi K40 Pro is billed to launch as the POCO F3 Pro internationally as launch markets of the POCO X3 Pro, POCO F3 and two versions of the Mi 11 Lite revealed - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Xiaomi plans to release two versions of the Mi 11 Lite, the POCO F3, POCO F3 Pro and the POCO X3 Pro in multiple markets, according to a new report. Apparently, Xiaomi will sell the Redmi K40 Pro as the POCO F3 Pro, like the POCO F2 Pro and the Redmi K30 Pro.
